summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3559, for the improvement of 20th Avenue Northeast, from East 50th Street to a point approximately 225 feet north of East 58th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 44017, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
